properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_ACCOMPANY ( ACCOM_NO , USER_NO , USER_NO2 , PLAN_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? );
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_ACCOMPANY WHERE ACCOM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ACCOM_NO , ACCOM_APPLY , ACCOM_STATUS , ACCOM_COMPLETE , USER_NO , USER_NO2 , PLAN_NO FROM TB_ACCOMPANY WHERE ACCOM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ACCOM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
